sections.title: Experience
sections.description: Below is some of my experience.

cards.name: dwe
cards.title: DeepWater Exploration Inc.
cards.subtitle: cpo & co-founder
description: [DWE.ai](https://dwe.ai) is committed to providing cutting-edge computer vision and perception solutions for a variety of machines, including underwater robots, surface vehicles, and rugged aerial drones. We enable engineers across industries to build intelligent systems that enhance their efficiency and capabilities. With innovative technologies, expertise, and a commitment to excellence, we are pushing the boundaries of what's possible with subsea robotics and systems.

sections.name: patents
sections.title: Patents
sections.description: These are the patents I was an inventor of.

cards.name: submersible-camera-for-underwater-vehicles
cards.title: Submersible Camera For Underwater Vehicles
description: **20230341750** - A submersible camera designed for underwater vehicles, surface vehicles, etc. The invention is a unique design that utilizes few components, minimal size, low production cost, high depth rating, high reliability, and wide compatibility with systems via an onboard processor.
